definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Afterward, the reporter then contact the West jinlingzhen related leadership to carry out inspections.
sentences.chinese: 隨後記者隨後聯繫西嶺鎮的相關領導到現場進行勘察。

sentences.english: After the pit was closed tailings utilization and small fragmentary ore bodies development should be concerned.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後應繼續勘察開發零星礦體及綜合利用尾礦。

sentences.english: Discussion the reconnaissance forecast and processes preventing and controlling of the road saliva floating ice.
sentences.chinese: 淺談公路涎流冰的勘察預測及處理防治。

sentences.english: The workers skirted the edge of the cliff on a geological survey.
sentences.chinese: 工人們沿着崖壁作了一次地質勘察。

sentences.english: The team suspects that another 18 species might be discovered.
sentences.chinese: 該勘察小組猜想還能再發現18個新物種。

sentences.english: We decided to chart out that unknown area.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定對那個陌生地區進行勘察。

sentences.english: G. Montgomerie, was quietly busy in surveying the mountains of Kashmir.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特哥摩利正悄悄忙於勘察克什米爾境內的山峯。

sentences.english: The prospective inspector prospected his prospect with his own perspective.
sentences.chinese: 未來的檢查員用自己的觀點勘察的他的前景。

sentences.english: The local mineral administration agencies were involved in the survey and evaluation of landslide since 1964.
sentences.chinese: 地曠部門1964年開始參加滑坡勘察和穩定性評價。

sentences.english: Commensurate with the quality of inspection certificate grading operations.
sentences.chinese: 與資質證書等級相適應的勘察業務。

sentences.english: Parts of Kamchatka resemble the Earth as it must have looked in the early chapters of its creation.
sentences.chinese: 部分勘察加地區想必就像地球在創世初期的樣子。

sentences.english: Borehole diagram is a kind of basic map in geological exploration works.
sentences.chinese: 鑽孔柱狀圖是工程勘察工作中的一類基礎圖件。

sentences.english: The establishment of the nuclear power station ought to be based on strict site survey and technical design.
sentences.chinese: 核電站的建立基於嚴格的地質勘察和技術設計。

sentences.english: The  prospective  inspector prospected his prospect with his own  perspective.
sentences.chinese: 未來的檢查員用自己的觀點勘察他的前景。

sentences.english: The surveying team went to remote regions of our country in search of mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 這個勘察隊到我國遙遠的地區去尋找礦藏。

sentences.english: If we do another survey, we'll find just as many.
sentences.chinese: 如果再做一次勘察，我們還能發現同樣多的新物種。
